mapper.select: SELECT auction.`auctionId`,`auctionStartTime`,`auctionEndTime`,`auctionStartPrice`, `auctionName`,MAX(`auctionPrice`) AS auctionPrice FROM `auctionrecord` INNER JOIN `auction` ON auction.`auctionId`=auctionrecord.`auctionId` INNER JOIN `auctionuser` ON auctionrecord.`userId`=auctionuser.`userId` ORDER BY auctionEndTime DESC
